name: Falling Blocks (itch) (Zach!)
description:
Thanks to Sebastian Lague on YouTube for the great tutorial! Honestly the perfect size game to kick me into gear and finally publish a game, no matter how small. This version is basically exactly the game Sebastian makes in the tutorial, with a couple colors changed for fun. I'm hoping to add a couple of changes in the future, just to play around with the code. 

Here's to many more projects in the future, large or small! :)
